DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy celgosivir plus peginterferon alfa-2b , without ribavirin , 12 week patient chronic hepatitis C genotype 1 infection .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Celgosivir Peginterferon Alfa-2b , With Without Ribavirin , Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Infection
DOC.criteria: 1865 year age , inclusive primary diagnosis chronic HCV infection nonresponders previous pegylated interferonbased therapy patient naive interferonbased therapy chronic HCV infection
